title: Inherited Construction of Porous Zinc Hydroxide Sulfate Layer for Stable Dendrite-Free Zn Anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00721B, Paper
Zhicheng Xiang, Yubing Qiu, Xingpeng Guo, Kai Qi, Zheng-Long Xu, Bao Yu Xia
A stable Zn anode for mitigating dendritic growth, corrosion and byproducts is vital for exhibiting high-performance electrochemical properties in aqueous Zn-ion batteries. An artificial solid/electrolyte interphase is an effective protective...
